definitions.definition: Consisting of scraps; fragmentary ; lacking unity or consistency .
Having an aggressive spirit; inclined to fight or strive .
examples: He's a scrappy dog and will charge at you if you taunt him.

definitions.definition: characterised by lots of ungainly or wild punches, grabs, wrestling, etc.
characterised by awkward or clumsy play.

main_definition: Consisting of scraps; fragmentary ; lacking unity or consistency .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Having an aggressive spirit; inclined to fight or strive .
( informal ) (Of a fight ) characterised by lots of ungainly or wild punches, grabs, wrestling, etc.
( informal ) (Of a sports match) characterised by awkward or clumsy play.
